title: Critical: Issue #225 Closed Without User Validation + No Issue Branches Created
problem: Agents were autonomously closing issues without user validation, violating user authority
solution: Emergency implementation of user validation gates and branch management integration
key_learnings: User validation is critical for maintaining user trust
Process integrity violations require immediate emergency fixes
Branch management must be integrated with workflow state transitions
Agent instructions must explicitly prevent autonomous issue closure
decisions: All agents must request user validation before claiming completion
Branch management must be automatic with state transitions
